work.name: RoomLelo
work.desc: RoomLelo is a new home rental platform with ease without brokerage student accommodation platform based in Varanasi, IN. I lead and development this project and deploy into AWS. The tech stack consisted of React, Node, PostgreSQL.

work.name: RGB LED Remote
work.desc: An app which can control RGB LED Strip lights & Bulbs build with Flutter SDK.

work.name: Live online visitor counter
work.desc: Server less real-time online visitors counter with firebase Realtime database you can implement in any JavaScript based frontend/html/react js/angular js.
